alert.note: Alert for Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 11:27PM CDT until May 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR BEAVER...LIPSCOMB...NORTHERN ROBERTS...NORTHERN HEMPHILL AND OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1127 PM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Wilmore to 7 miles south of Darrouzett, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Lipscomb, Canadian, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Follett, Higgins, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Farnsworth, Boyd, Waka, Floris, Glazier, Lake Marvin and Bryans Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
